parameter.name: CurrentValue
parameter.description: The current value of the counter.

parameter.name: Minimum Value
parameter.description: The minimum value of the counter.

parameter.name: Maximum Value
parameter.description: The minimum value of the counter.

parameter.name: Center
parameter.description: The midpoint of the color band.

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: The width of the color band.

parameter.name: Edge Soften
parameter.description: The softness of the color band's inside and outside edges.
